Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sure. Even the greatest warrior needs
rest. Come by again if you want to give
it another try.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Did you decide that you, too, want to
train like the best?
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Angry_00>You need to train hard, too, if you don't
want the monsters to get you!
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Decided you want to give my elite training
a try, huh? The rain's no obstacle for the
truly dedicated!
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm itching to start! And once I get going,
I don't stop till it's over!
Talk_0019: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>That's more like it! <sp:5:0:0>Now get back here!
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Do you want to get in on this training?<sp:5:0:0>
It only costs <clr:0000>20 rupees <clr:ffff>a go.
Talk_1002: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Phew! I worked up a sweat watching you!
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:WorkHeavy_00>My training setup works even in the rain!
Still costs <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> though. Want to
go for it?
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm here because <clr:0000>Ornest<clr:ffff> over there hired
me to be.
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm just helping with that. Turns out it
pays pretty well!
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>See that impressive tower back there?<sp:5:0:0>
We built that baby just for this.
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know it's raining, right? You still need
something from me?
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aren't you curious what kind of training
I'm talking about?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Of course you are!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Who are you? <sp:5:0:0>Someone else who
aspires to greatness?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Guess you heard my little pep talk to
myself, huh? <sp:5:0:0>Talk about embarrassing.<sp:0:4:0>For us Rito, our ability to control the
wind is one of our big advantages in
fighting monsters.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>That's why I train here every day!
Talk_0036: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I guess it was a little tough for a Hylian.
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ornest and I built this training tower.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>Though between you and me, Ornest
barely did any of the building part!<sp:0:4:0>He seriously thinks he's gonna bulk up
when he won't put the work in?!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I use these sweet wings of mine to <clr:0000>return<clr:ffff>
the balls that fly at me, pushing them
back one after the next!<sp:0:4:0>What do you think? <sp:5:0:0>Want to give it a try?
Talk_0037: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Wait right there! I'll be over in a second.
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ornest is training pretty heavily so he can
bulk up.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Tabult will lob <clr:0000>balls<clr:ffff> at you. <sp:5:0:0>The game is to
<clr:0000>return <clr:ffff>them to the moving basket.
Talk_0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK, but I'm not giving back the <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>
you already paid. <sp:5:0:0>Still want to quit?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I charge <clr:0000>20 rupees <clr:ffff>so I can keep Tabult
on retainer. So, think you can <clr:0000>return<clr:ffff>
the balls?
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Since you got a perfect score, you can
take this too!
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ha! Think you can wing 'em in like me?<sp:5:0:0>
Then let me tell you how the setup works!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_00>I don't miss a single day, even when
it rains!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oooh! Even if it wasn't many, I'm still
impressed you did that well!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Probably by pure luck. But either way,
you've got spirit!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>You deserve something for putting on a
good show. Take this.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>You'll be faced with a total of <sp:2:e:3c:36004200610073006b0065007400620061006c006c005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00420061006c006c004e0075006d00ffff00cd> balls
coming at you.<sp:0:4:0>Getting a green ball in is worth <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But a red ball nets you <clr:0000>three<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I don't see a featherless guy like you
doing it my way though.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>So I'll let you use any tools or mysterious
powers you've got going for you to
<clr:0000>return<clr:ffff> them.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>What do you say? Want to try again?
It'll be another <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>I don't believe this... How is a score like
that even possible?!<sp:0:4:0>I've never seen anyone get so many in
before! There's clearly way more to you
Hylians than I thought.<sp:0:4:0>I still have a long way to go before I can
achieve anything as good.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>You deserve a real reward for putting on
such an incredible show. Take this!
Talk_0025: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Painful_00>After all that, you're not even curious?
Talk_0027: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Great! I'll go set it up again!
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>When is <clr:0000>Ornest<clr:ffff> gonna start his training?
I'm tired of waiting around.
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:CallFar_00>Heeey! Where are you going?! Are you
seriously giving up midtraining?
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was gonna give you this <clr:0000>feathered edge<clr:ffff>
as well, but it looks like you have too
many weapons already.
Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was gonna give you this <clr:0000>feathered spear<clr:ffff>
as well, but it looks like you have too
many weapons already.
Talk_0042: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll hold on to it for when you make room.
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Looks like you're still carrying too many
weapons to take the reward I was gonna
give you.
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, you ditched a weapon or two, huh?
Then this is all yours!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Hm?! This isn't enough rupees! <sp:5:1:0>Maybe
you should come back some other time.
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, you can't keep the balls. I need
those for the training exercise.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The guy operating the tower is <clr:0000>Tabult<clr:ffff>.
I keep him on retainer so I can train!
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Huh. I don't think you got even one in.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Not as easy as it looks to <clr:0000>return<clr:ffff> the balls,
is it?
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Nice. Let me go tell Tabult we're on.
I won't be long!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>That's not half bad!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Maybe I've been underestimating Hylians.<sp:5:0:0>
You're more resourceful than I thought.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>You deserve something for putting on a
good show. <sp:5:0:0>Take this.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>What theâ€” That's amazing! <sp:5:0:0>How did you
do that?!<sp:0:4:0>Even us Rito can't put up scores like that.
What's your secret?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>You deserve a real reward for putting on
such an incredible show. Take this!
